channel.title: How do I add glories for 317 Delta base
channel.description: ok I messed around for hours with glories and idk where to add to and idk how to make the 'rub' part work (yes i did if(ItemId == 1712)crap and did not work) so if any wants to help please post your script under this or link me a script if there is already one out. Thanks don't flame.
